price: Na (nsuom hyεn no) nam (nsuo no so) a Y’ani hwε. (Saa nsuyire yi yε) akatua ma obia wannye annie.
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
